name: wxOutliner - Outliner based on wxWindows
short_description: wxOutliner is a cross-platform desktop productivity application based on the Open Source wxWindows library. Its function is to provide note-taking and brainstorming features valued by former users of the MORE family of outliners from the Mac platform.
